pullrequest.title: Add countdown feature to common::Timer, expose countdown to TimerGUIPlugin

content.raw:
Alright, I don't have an OSX machine so I can't test this directly, but here's my idea: the `Time` test doesn't cover `Time::Sleep`, only setting the time based on operators and getting the current time. I wonder if `Time::Sleep` is broken on OSX.

Shall I write a test for this or are you on it?
content.html:
Alright, I don't have an OSX machine so I can't test this directly, but here's my idea: the Time test doesn't cover Time::Sleep, only setting the time based on operators and getting the current time. I wonder if Time::Sleep is broken on OSX.

Shall I write a test for this or are you on it?
